title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp]JurassiCraft 侏罗纪时代 1.3.2
author: Saya_
txt_content:
本帖最后由 caominjia168 于 2015-2-18 19:42 编辑 

侏罗纪时代/JurassiCraft



简介
    作者的话：JurassiCraft MOD是把历前生物添加到Minecraft的世界中，他的灵感来自于侏罗纪公园，但不限于所有JP经典：更多的生物可能在未来版本中添加！生物都是侏罗纪公园的风格，通过获取化石或琥珀色，使化石或琥珀创造DNA，将DNA注入受精软，并且孵化蛋。这个MOD最近合并了其他2个MOD，旧时代的MOD和化石狩猎的MOD，这将给用户带来一个更完整的minecraft和（modded？）(翻译不精确)
JurassiCraft is a mod made to bring prehistoric creatures to the world of Minecraft. It is inspired by Jurassic Park, but is not limited to all JP canon: as many creatures and features as possible will be added! Creatures are made Jurassic Park style, by obtaining fossils or amber, using the fossils or amber to create DNA, inserting the DNA into eggs, and hatching the eggs. The mod recently merged with two other mods, entitled the Bygone Age Mod and the Fossil Hunting Mod, which will bring users a more complete modded-Minecraft experience.

内容

Eggs
With JurassiCraft, most prehistoric creatures are added by way of hatching eggs. Eggs are created in a three-step process that utilizes machines added by the mod. After being created, the egg is hatched in either a dry environment (on land) or in a wet environment (under water). An egg takes approximately 102 seconds to hatch and only hatches one mob at a time.

Fossils
Fossils are items dropped by any type of fossil ore. There is a 25% chance of a fossil being dropped from the ore. Fossils are used in the process of creating prehistoric creatures in Minecraft.

DNA
DNA is an item in JurassiCraft used in the process of creating prehistoric creatures. It is created by putting fossils, prehistoric meats, or amber into an analyzer.

Growth Serum
Growth serum is a JurassiCraft item that, when given to a prehistoric creature, instantly increases the size of said creature. It can only be used on creatures added by JurassiCraft. It is crafted by placing green dye, a golden carrot, a water bucket, and a food item into the crafting table.

Amber
Amber is an item dropped from amber ore with a 100% drop rate. Amber is used in order to create the prehistoric creatures added with JurassiCraft.

Dino-Pad
The Dino-Pad is a "tablet" that shows the statistics of your prehistoric creatures.

Dinosaurs
Currently added dinosaurs:

Ankylosaur, Brachiosaur, Velociraptor, Stegosaur, Triceratops, Tyrannosaurus, Gallimimus, Hypsilophodon, Leaellynasaur, Herrerasaur, Dilophosaurus, Oviraptor, Parasaurolophus, Arsinoitherium, Basilosaurus, Leptictidium, Uintatherium, Deinotherium, Mammoth, Moeritherium, Paraceratherium, Cearadactylus, Tylosaurus, Titanis, Coelacanth, Meganeura, Ammonite, Brachiopod.
以上太多 懒得翻译（太冷了 早点发完早点睡觉嘛）

tnt990099 发表于 2015-6-8 23:01
化石怎么挖啊？？我挖了怎么什么都没掉出来啊
只研究出来白色骨骼的化石是先找到石膏原石，按照合成表制作石膏绷带，拿着它右键化石，等一会后就可以挖了，挖下来的化石可以通过清洗台清洗出来。然后干什么就不知道了。有没有大神啊，求教程啊
